required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on May 29, 2018
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.brief_title: Evaluation of Plant-based Nutritional Products on Stem Cells
clinical_study.official_title: Evaluation of Plant-based Nutritional Products on Stem Cells

brief_summary.textblock: The purpose of this clinical study is to evaluate acute effects of plant-based nutritional extracts on adult stem cells, using a randomized double-blinded placebo-controlled cross-over study design.

detailed_description.textblock: The purpose of this clinical study is to evaluate acute effects of plant-based nutritional extracts on adult stem cells, using a randomized double-blinded placebo-controlled cross-over study design. The research involves testing of acute effects of single doses of antioxidant-rich berry-based extracts, compared to a placebo. Blood samples are taken at baseline and 1 and 2 hours after consuming a single dose. The blood will be used to measure the numbers of different types of stem cells, to evaluate potential effects of stem cell mobilization and homing after consuming plant-based extracts. Adult stem cells are a type of cells that play a role in repairing and rejuvenating various tissue and organs in the body. At NIS Labs, we have shown that many types of plant-based nutritional products have small but reproducible and significant effects on stem cells, cytokines, and regenerative growth factors.

study_design_info.intervention_model_description: The study uses a randomized double-blinded placebo-controlled cross-over study design.
study_design_info.masking_description: Both the study participants and the research staff interacting with study participants will be blinded to the plant based extract versus placebo.

primary_outcome.measure: Change to stem cell numbers in blood circulation.
primary_outcome.time_frame: Changes at 1 and 2 hours after consumption.
primary_outcome.description: Flow cytometry evaluation of stem cell phenotype.

secondary_outcome.measure: Change to numbers of circulating CD45dim CD34+ stem cells in blood circulation.
secondary_outcome.time_frame: Changes at 1 and 2 hours after consumption.
secondary_outcome.description: Flow cytometry evaluation of stem cell phenotype.

secondary_outcome.measure: Change to numbers of circulating CD45dim CD34+ CD309- stem cells in blood circulation.
secondary_outcome.time_frame: Changes at 1 and 2 hours after consumption.
secondary_outcome.description: Flow cytometry evaluation of stem cell phenotype.

secondary_outcome.measure: Change to numbers of circulating CD45dim CD34+ CD309+ stem cells in blood circulation.
secondary_outcome.time_frame: Changes at 1 and 2 hours after consumption.
secondary_outcome.description: Flow cytometry evaluation of stem cell phenotype.

secondary_outcome.measure: Change to numbers of circulating CD45- CD31+ CD309+ stem cells in blood circulation.
secondary_outcome.time_frame: Changes at 1 and 2 hours after consumption.
secondary_outcome.description: Flow cytometry evaluation of stem cell phenotype.

secondary_outcome.measure: Change to numbers of circulating CD45- CD90+ stem cells in blood circulation.
secondary_outcome.time_frame: Changes at 1 and 2 hours after consumption.
secondary_outcome.description: Flow cytometry evaluation of stem cell phenotype.

arm_group.description: Blend of plant-based antioxidant-rich berry-based extracts.

intervention.description: Seabuckthorn berry proanthocyanidin extract 250 mg single dose
Seabuckthorn berry proanthocyanidin extract 500 mg single dose
Seabuckthorn berry blend with other berry-based antioxidants
